emulator_description.author: Marco Bonici
emulator_description.miscellanea: The emulator has been trained using CLASS and pybird. The training dataset has been created by passing P_cb to PyBird, assuming there is only one massive neutrino.
emulator_description.parameters: z, ln10^10 As, ns, H0, omega_b, omega_c, Mnu, w0, wa.
